00027 namespace trsl
00028 {
00029   template <class Predicate, class Iterator>
00030   class persistent_filter_iterator;
00031 
00032   namespace detail
00033   {
00035     template <class Predicate, class Iterator>
00036     struct persistent_filter_iterator_base
00037     {
00038       typedef boost::iterator_adaptor<
00039         persistent_filter_iterator<Predicate, Iterator>
00040         , Iterator
00041         , boost::use_default
00042         , typename boost::mpl::if_<
00043         boost::is_convertible<
00044         typename boost::iterator_traversal<Iterator>::type
00045         , boost::random_access_traversal_tag
00046         >
00047 /* -    , bidirectional_traversal_tag*/
00048         , boost::forward_traversal_tag/* + */
00049 /* -    , use_default*/
00050         , boost::forward_traversal_tag/* + */
00051         >::type
00052       > type;
00053     };
00054   }
00055   
00092   template <class Predicate, class Iterator>
00093   class persistent_filter_iterator
00094     : public detail::persistent_filter_iterator_base<Predicate, Iterator>::type
00095   {
00096     typedef typename detail::persistent_filter_iterator_base<
00097       Predicate, Iterator
00098       >::type super_t;
00099 
00100     friend class boost::iterator_core_access;
00101 
00102   public:
00103     persistent_filter_iterator() { }
00104 
00105     persistent_filter_iterator(Predicate f, Iterator x, Iterator end_ = Iterator())
00106       : super_t(x), m_predicate(f), m_end(end_)
00107       {
00108         satisfy_predicate();
00109       }
00110 
00111     persistent_filter_iterator(Iterator x, Iterator end_ = Iterator())
00112       : super_t(x), m_predicate(), m_end(end_)
00113       {
00114         // Pro8 is a little too aggressive about instantiating the
00115         // body of this function.
00116 #if !BOOST_WORKAROUND(__MWERKS__, BOOST_TESTED_AT(0x3003))
00117         // Don't allow use of this constructor if Predicate is a
00118         // function pointer type, since it will be 0.
00119         BOOST_STATIC_ASSERT(boost::is_class<Predicate>::value);
00120 #endif 
00121         satisfy_predicate();
00122       }
00123 
00124     template<class OtherIterator>
00125     persistent_filter_iterator(
00126       persistent_filter_iterator<Predicate, OtherIterator> const& t
00127       , typename boost::enable_if_convertible<OtherIterator, Iterator>::type* = 0
00128       )
00129       : super_t(t.base()), m_predicate(t.predicate()), m_end(t.end()) {}
00130 
00131     Predicate predicate() const { return m_predicate; }
00132 
00133     Iterator end() const { return m_end; }
00134 
00135   private:
00136     void increment()
00137       {
00138 /* -      ++(this->base_reference());*/
00139         satisfy_predicate();
00140       }
00141 
00142 /* -  void decrement()*/
00143 /* -  {*/
00144 /* -    while(!this->m_predicate(*--(this->base_reference()))){};*/
00145 /* -  }*/
00146 
00147     void satisfy_predicate()
00148       {
00149         while (this->base() != this->m_end && !this->m_predicate(*this->base()))
00150           ++(this->base_reference());
00151       }
00152 
00153     template<class OtherIterator>/* + */
00154     bool equal(/* + */
00155       persistent_filter_iterator<Predicate, OtherIterator> const& t/* + */
00156       , typename boost::enable_if_convertible<OtherIterator, Iterator>::type* = 0/* + */
00157       ) const/* + */
00158       {/* + */
00159         return (this->base() == t.base()) &&/* + */
00160           // There is always at most one end iterator/* + */
00161           ((this->base() == m_end) ||/* + */
00162            (this->predicate() == t.predicate()));/* + */
00163       }/* + */
00164 
00165     // Probably should be the initial base class so it can be
00166     // optimized away via EBO if it is an empty class.
00167     Predicate m_predicate;
00168     Iterator m_end;
00169   };
00170 
00171   template <class Predicate, class Iterator>
00172   persistent_filter_iterator<Predicate,Iterator>
00173   make_persistent_filter_iterator(Predicate f, Iterator x, Iterator end = Iterator())
00174   {
00175     return persistent_filter_iterator<Predicate,Iterator>(f,x,end);
00176   }
00177 
00178   template <class Predicate, class Iterator>
00179   persistent_filter_iterator<Predicate,Iterator>
00180   make_persistent_filter_iterator(
00181     typename boost::iterators::enable_if<
00182     boost::is_class<Predicate>
00183     , Iterator
00184     >::type x
00185     , Iterator end = Iterator()
00186 #if BOOST_WORKAROUND(BOOST_MSVC, < 1300)
00187     , Predicate* = 0
00188 #endif 
00189     )
00190   {
00191     return persistent_filter_iterator<Predicate,Iterator>(x,end);
00192   }
